page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: FARMING { In general the farming in this area {is mixed:livestock and crops are {worked on though there is no dairy {farming the attitude being that there {is too much work for too little profit {particularly since the introduction of {the new EEC milk quotas. { The EEC has also affected the corn {prices but not greatly. { Our farming information was received {through two of the farms in the area: { A) A 250 acre farm with { 200 ewes { 200 lambs { 9 tups { 300 bullocks { B) A 224 acre farm with { 80 sheep { 50 bullocks { Both farms had 3 workers although {they employ extra at haytime and
